org.terrier.utility

Class TerrierTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.terrier.utility.TerrierTimer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class TerrierTimer
extends Thread
    This class implements a timer.

    • Nested Class Summary
